article_node.title: 3 High-Yield Dividend Stocks You Can Buy in September and Hold Forever
article_node.summary: The article highlights three high‑yield dividend stocks—Realty Income (REIT), Healthpeak Properties, and Pfizer—that offer yields above 5% and have a track record of dividend growth. Realty Income, despite a 22% decline from its 2022 peak, continues to raise dividends and maintains a 5.5% yield, while Healthpeak’s merger with Physicians Realty has lowered its payout but the stock price drop has increased its 6.8% yield. Pfizer, though its share price has fallen, has increased its payout for 16 consecutive years, making it a compelling long‑term dividend play. The piece positions these stocks as attractive options for investors seeking stable, growing income streams in a challenging high‑interest environment.
